channel.title: Essays on Rochan Avlur

item.title: The Philosophy of Altered Carbon - Immortality is not Beautiful
item.description: Rochan Avlur Venkat 1 I am not sure how many of you have heard about the recently released television series created by Laeta Kalogridis that premiered on Netflix on February 2, 2018. The critical reviews that it received during its short ten episode season made it one of the most actively debated and discussed topic in hundreds of communities on the Internet. From casual friday night viewers, to science fiction enthusiasts and all the way to philosophy groups, the first season had something special for everyone to take away.
